description: This file provides utility functions related to cryptographic operations, including a factory function to create a crypto object (AnscCreateCryptoPub). It includes licensing info, module description, and an implementation for object creation.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscCreateCryptoPub(ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new crypto object handle by calling the underlying creation function AnscCryptoPubCreate with the provided owner context.
